title: Jurassic Park's Jeff Goldblum, 66, steps out hand-in-hand with his wife Emilie Livingston, 36
text:
They have been married since 2014 and still going strong.

And on Wednesday afternoon, Jeff Goldblum, 66, and his wife Emilie Livingston, 36, looked like they were going strong as they stepped out into the Los Angeles sunshine hand-in-hand.

The gorgeous couple both rocked eccentric fashion choices while enjoying their day together.

Stepping out: Jeff Goldblum, 66, and his wife Emilie Livingston, 36, stepped out into the Los Angeles sunshine hand-in-hand while out and about

The Jurassic Park star looked dashing in a white zip-up jacket that had pockets at the chest and a black zipper and buttons.

Underneath he wore a button up comic-style shirt paired with some khaki jeans.

He finished off the look with a black fedora and black glasses.

Stylish: The Jurassic Park star looked dashing in a white zip-up jacket that had pockets at the chest and a black zipper and buttons

The Canadian dancer wore a head-to-toe pink outfit for the occasion while out with her lover.

She styled her hair up and had a pink fuzzy headband to keep her hair back.

Her top and pants matched perfectly and she had the short sleeve blouse tucked into the high-waisted pants.

She finished off the look with a pair of black high heels.

Date night: Emilie and Jess looked elegant while at the Primtetime Creative Arts Emmy Awards back in September

Both stars share their two children Charlie, aged three, and River, aged two.

She revealed that it was 'scary' when she first decided to marry Jeff, who was previously married to Patricia Gaul and Geena Davis.

In the post she penned a year ago she also revealed that they 'talked about it together with our therapist until we decided it [marriage] was the right thing to do.'

Glwoing: The couple continued their Emmy streak and even headed out to the Primetime Emmy After Party with a big smile and Jeff making a funny face

It was recently announced that all of the original Jurassic Park stars will be returning for the highly anticipated Jurassic World 3.

Production will begin in 2020 and bring back Lauren Dern, Sam Neill, and Jeff for the spin-off of the original 1993 film.

Jurassic World 3 will head to theaters in 2021.

Family time: The parents are spotted flying out to Toronto while holding hands with their little one, Charlie
description: They have been married since 2014 and still going strong. And on Wednesday afternoon, Jeff Goldblum, 66, and his wife Emilie Livingston, 36, stepped out into the Los Angeles sunshine hand-in-hand.
